title: Add FO-09 KV store seed entries and run db:seed
description:
Add FO-09 prompts to the KV store seed file and run db:seed.

Add entries for these KV store keys (see spec section 'KV Store Keys'):
- versions.fo-09-discovery._info.default
- versions.fo-09-discovery._model_name.default
- versions.fo-09-discovery._temperature.default
- versions.fo-09-discovery.system.default (modified for sentences + no reflective statement)
- versions.fo-09-discovery.prompt.default
- versions.fo-09-affirmation._info.default
- versions.fo-09-affirmation._model_name.default
- versions.fo-09-affirmation._temperature.default
- versions.fo-09-affirmation.system.default (modified for 5 affirmations)
- versions.fo-09-affirmation.prompt.default
- versions.fo-09-affirmation.prompt.with_feedback (includes liked/discarded/no-repeat sections)

Base on FO-08's seed entries in src/db/seed.ts. Key changes:
- Discovery system prompt: include complete sentences section, remove reflective statement
- Affirmation prompt: 5 affirmations instead of 10
- Add with_feedback variant for affirmation prompt

After adding entries, run: npm run db:seed

Files to modify:
- src/db/seed.ts (add FO-09 entries)

⚠️ Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: npm run db:seed completes without errors
